item.title: Shelby add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Shelby add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Dreams are the touchstones of our characters." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Frank Lloyd Wright
item.description: "An idea is salvation by imagination" -- Frank Lloyd Wright

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle
